summary: Dar is a warrior who can talk to the beasts. He is forced to travel to Earth to stop his evil brother from stealing an atomic bomb and turning their native land from a desert into, well - a desert.
cast: Marc Singer|Kari Wuhrer|Sarah Douglas|Wings Hauser|James Avery|Robert Fieldsteel|Arthur Malet|Robert Z'Dar|Michael Berryman|David Carrera|Carl Ciarfalio|Lawrence Dobkin|Steve Donmyer|Richard L. Duran|James Patten Eagle|John Fifer|Doug Franklin|Kyle Fredericks|Paul Goodman|Gordon Greene|Charles Hyman|Lawrence A. Mandley|Alva Megowan|Daniel O'Haco|Jeanne Pfleiger|Rex Pierson|Wayne Pére|Mark Roberts|David Sederholm|Vic Trevino|Dick Warlock|Eric Waterhouse|Frank Welker|Dan Woren|Charles Young|Richard N. McGuire|Tai
title: El señor de las bestias 2: La puerta del tiempo
